about-me.title: About Me
about-me.content:
I'm a Software Engineer currently honing my skills at Northeastern University, Boston.
Key Areas of Expertise: Data Analytics and Management (SQL & NoSQL), Full Stack Web Development (MEAN & Rails) and Software Engineering (Python, C++).

univ.title: Northeastern University
univ.college: College of Computer and Information Science
univ.degree: Candidate for Master of Science in Computer Science
courses: Distributed Data Processing with Map Reduce

univ.title: Heriot-Watt University
univ.college: School of Mathematical and Computer Sciences
univ.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

univ.title: University of Kerala
univ.college: Mar Baselios College of Engineering and Technology
univ.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering, First Class.

work.title: Northeastern University
desc: Evaluating the social influences on different cultures by applying Machine Learning Algorithms using Python.
Created a data extraction layer to get data from the Yelp dataset within MongoDB with MapReduce.

work.title: Grey Ocean Analytics
desc: Developed modules of an Artificial Intelligence project for the financial sector using Neo4j, Python, SNS and SQS.
Led a team of five junior developers during the project ensuring high performance and completion before deadline.
Designed and deployed MongoDB and Neo4j databases on Amazon Web Services EC2.

work.title: Evolvence Capital & Ginza Holdings
desc: Deployed IT systems and LS Retail with Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 for all Retail & Hospitality outlets of the group.
Developed an eCommerce solution for Ginza using Magento. Maintained five CMS (WordPress) sites of the group.
Developed and maintained Microsoft SQL Server and MySQL databases for ERP and other systems.
Installed Linux servers and AV software systems for Interactive Displays and Video Walls at Real Madrid Caf√©.

projects.name: Model User Preferences for Location Based Recommendations
projects.desc: Developed project to Model User Preferences for Location Based Recommendations using python and mongoDB.

projects.desc: Developed project to Model User Preferences for Location Based Recommendations using python and mongoDB.

photography.title: Photography
photography.desc: There are so many wonderful things around us that we take for granted. Through photography, I hope to bring these to attention, so that everyone can appreciate its beauty. The photos you find on this site are some of my work. If you are a fellow photographer, connect with me on 500px

music.title: Music
music.desc: Music is one of the things that I cannot live without. It sets the pace of my day and sometimes even inspires me. If I like a song, I learn the lyrics by the next day. I'm also an occasional singer, connect with me on SoundCloud to listen to some of my tracks.

travel.title: Travel
travel.desc: New Places, New Experiences. I have been travelling most of my life. It is difficult to find a place that I haven't been to in the cities that I have lived in. Most of my snaps are from my travels.

quotes.text: If you feel like you are working for someone, you are not doing it right..
quotes.author: Me
